mapper.insert: insert into YARD_APPOINT( PLACE_ID, APPLY_USER_ID, PLACE_DATE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, BOOK_DURATION, BOOK_FEE, STATUS, NOTE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, YARDAPPOINT_ID ) values ( #{PLACE_ID}, #{APPLY_USER_ID}, #{PLACE_DATE}, #{BEGIN_TIME}, #{END_TIME}, #{BOOK_DURATION}, #{BOOK_FEE}, #{STATUS}, #{NOTE}, now(), now(), #{YARDAPPOINT_ID} )
mapper.update: update YARD_APPOINT set PLACE_DATE = #{PLACE_DATE}, BEGIN_TIME = #{BEGIN_TIME}, END_TIME = #{END_TIME}, STATUS = #{STATUS}, NOTE = #{NOTE}, UPDATE_TIME = now(), YARDAPPOINT_ID = YARDAPPOINT_ID where YARDAPPOINT_ID = #{YARDAPPOINT_ID}
mapper.select: select PLACE_ID, APPLY_USER_ID, PLACE_DATE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, BOOK_DURATION, BOOK_FEE, STATUS, NOTE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, YARDAPPOINT_ID from YARD_APPOINT where YARDAPPOINT_ID = #{YARDAPPOINT_ID}

AND b.POSITION LIKE concat(concat('%',#{pd.POSITION, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

AND a.STATUS = #{pd.STATUS, jdbcType=INTEGER}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
